title: Time Period Filter Sync Across Graphs
steps: [1] Select 7 Days → check both bar and line chart
expected_results: [1] Both graphs reflect selected time period starting from current time backward

title: Show Top 5 Suppliers by Trip Volume
expected_results: [1] Displays top 5 suppliers with highest number of trips

title: Auto-adjust Y Axis Scale Based on Min-Max
steps: [1] Load chart with varied trip counts
expected_results: [1] Y-axis auto scales between min/max values

title: Show Customer Logo Above Bar
expected_results: [1] Customer logo shown at the top of each bar

title: Hover to View Trip Count & Highlight Bar
expected_results: [1] Show exact trip count tooltip and highlight bar

title: Load Line Chart by Clicking Bar
expected_results: [1] Loads that supplier’s Trip Volume Trend in the line chart

title: Placeholder Text Before Supplier Selected
expected_results: [1] Line chart shows message: “Please select a customer to view the vehicle type wise KMs”
stepdescription: View line chart without bar click

title: Typable Supplier Dropdown Interaction
expected_results: [1] Line chart loads trips for selected supplier

title: Accurate Trip Volume Trend on Line Chart (No Smoothing)
steps: [1] Open 24H tab → hover on data points
expected_results: [1] Points match raw timestamp data; no smoothing or interpolation

title: Line Chart Hover Tooltip & Grid Line
expected_results: [1] Tooltip shows exact date, time, no. of trips with dotted X/Y lines

title: Chart Date Filter Uses Actual Start Time of Load
steps: [1] Cross-reference chart with trip actual start time
expected_results: [1] Only trips with actual start time in range should appear

title: Incorrect Load Count Display in Bar Chart (Known Bug)
expected_results: [1] Should match exact load count assigned
stepdescription: Compare load count in chart vs trip records

title: Prevent Premature Load in Trend Chart
expected_results: [1] Should remain visibly empty with only the instruction message
